resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75494</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf0aeb-618c-4350-2795-ee565e560789#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Battersea-pajzs.</string>
            <string language="en">Battersea-shield</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Battersea-Schild</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Battersea-bouclier</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Battersea-protetor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Battersea-schermo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ψαττερσεα-ασπίδα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Battersea-blindaje</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">bronz pajzsdísz, tekergő indadísszel, vörös zománccal.</string>
            <string language="en">bronze shield ornament, with twisting foliated scroll and red enamel</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ötvösség,  Kr. e. 1. század,  Battersea-pajzs,  bronz pajzsdísz,  Temze folyó,  inda,  palmetta,  zománc,  </string>
            <string language="en">goldsmith's art, 1st century BC, Battersea-shield, bronze shield ornament, River Thames, sarmentum, palmette, enamel</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bronzeschildverzierung, mit dem Verdrehen der 
foliated Rolle und der roten Emaille</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ornement en bronze de bouclier, avec tordre le 
défilement feuilleté et l'émail rouge</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ornament de bronze do protetor, com torção de 
scroll foliated e do esmalte vermelho</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ornamento bronze dello schermo, con il torcimento 
rotolo foliated e dello smalto rosso</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διακόσμηση ασπίδων χαλκού, με το στρίψιμο του 
φυλλοειδούς κυλίνδρου και του κόκκινου σμάλτου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ornamento de bronce del blindaje, con torcer el 
desfile foliated y el esmalte rojo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kunst des Goldschmieds, 1. Jahrhundert BC, 
Battersea-Schild, Bronzeschildverzierung, Fluß Themse, sarmentum, 
palmette, Emaille</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'art de l'orfèvre, 1er siècle BC, Battersea-bouclier,
ornement en bronze de bouclier, fleuve la Tamise, sarmentum, palmette,
émail</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arte do goldsmith, 1o século BC, Battersea-protetor, 
ornament de bronze do protetor, rio Tamisa, sarmentum, palmette, 
esmalte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte dell'orafo, primo secolo BC, Battersea-schermo, 
ornamento bronze dello schermo, fiume Tamigi, sarmentum, palmette, 
smalto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τέχνη χρυσοχόου, 1$ος αιώνας Π.Χ., ψαττερσεα-ασπίδα, 
διακόσμηση ασπίδων χαλκού, ποταμός Τάμεσης, sarmentum, 
palmette, σμάλτο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arte del orfebre, 1r siglo A.C., Battersea-blindaje, 
ornamento de bronce del blindaje, río Thames, sarmentum, palmette, 
esmalte</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:

end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
